How to install this game?
Please tell me!
showing xlive.dll missing. pls help

The setup.bat does not do the decompression, it never starts, half an hour here and it doesn't show me anything but both black windows.
I use Vista 64, I've already installed games this way, any tip?
I've already run it as administrator.

Hey, I found a Solution:

Open setup.bat with your NOTEPAD, and erase these three lines:

TPTB.4.EVER.exe >nul
pause
cls

Now, save Setup.bat file, run it. Now the decompression will begin.

Done.

Hugs from Brazil.

is this game working until now?
xlive.dll not found

Working Well

NOT A FAKE GAME/RIP
Quality is great.

To Play :

1. Download The Game
2. Open The Downloaded Folder
3. Extract the zip file with 7z, Winrar To Any Folder
4. Open The Folder To where you have extracted
5. Run Setup.bat (Batch File) of size : 1.48kb
6. It opens a window saying Enjoy and stuff and then another window for TPTB Honours, Intros etc.
7. Just Hit Escape 
8. Now The Original Window(The One Which said Enjoy Game, TPTB) will now say "Press Any Key"
9. Press Any Key
10. Wait for 10 Minutes For Rebiulding Until It Says : Done. Press Any Key To Continue 
11. Press Any Key.
12. Play From Desktop


For Those Showing xlive.dll not found, Download The Windows Games Live Client From Google and Play.
And follow the above steps. IT DOES NOT ASK FOR A PRODUCT KEY. PERIOD
